titleStmt.title: A winding-sheet for the Presbyterian, or, A mite touching the ordination of ministers by Arise Evans.
titleStmt.author: Evans, Arise, b. 1607.

publicationStmt.publisher: Sold by the Author at Mr. Cadelth's in Black Fryars near the Kings Play-House,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Trinity College (Dublin, Ireland). Library.
